sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext} from 'react'
import Context from '../context'

import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'
import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'
import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'


export default class Edit extends React.Component{
    constructor(props){
        super(props)
            
        this.state ={
            show: false,
 
        }
    }
     
    render(){

        const handleClose = () => this.setState({show: false});
        const handleShow = () => this.setState({show:true});
        <Context.Consumer>
            
                
                handleClose()
            }
        </Context.Consumer>
        return(
            <React.Fragment>

                <>
                    <Button variant="btn btn-success my-button" onClick={handleShow}>
                        Edit
                    </Button>

                    <Modal show={this.state.show} 
                           onHide={handleClose} 
                           animation={true}
                           size="lg" 
                           aria-labelledby="contained-modal-title-vcenter" 
                           centered className="modal-edited">
                        
                        <Modal.Body>
                            <Form>
                                <Form.Row>    
                                    <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formBasicName">
                                        <Form.Label>Name</Form.Label>
                                        <Form.Control type="text" defaultValue={this.props.user.name} />
                                        <Form.Text className="text-muted">
                                        
                                        </Form.Text>
                                    </Form.Group>

                                    <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formBasicName">
                                        <Form.Label>Lastname</Form.Label>
                                        <Form.Control type="text" defaultValue={this.props.user.lastname} />
                                        <Form.Text className="text-muted">
                                        
                                        </Form.Text>
                                    </Form.Group>
                                </Form.Row>

                                <Form.Row>
                                    <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formBasicName">
                                        <Form.Label>Age</Form.Label>
                                        <Form.Control type="text" defaultValue={this.props.user.age} />
                                        <Form.Text className="text-muted">
                                        
                                        </Form.Text>
                                    </Form.Group>
                                    <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="formBasicName">
                                        <Form.Label>Gender</Form.Label>
                                        <Form.Control as="select" defaultValue={this.props.user.gender}>
                                            <option>Male</option>
                                            <option>Female</option>
                                            <option>Something Else</option>
                                        </Form.Control>
                                    </Form.Group>
                                </Form.Row>
                                </Form>
                        </Modal.Body>
                        <Modal.Footer>
                        <Button variant="secondary" onClick={saveAndClose(this.props.user)}>
                            Close
                        </Button>
                        <Button variant="primary" onClick={handleClose}>
                            Save Changes
                        </Button>
                        </Modal.Footer>
                    </Modal>
                    </>
                
            </React.Fragment>
)
        }}
